short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow access to safe links based on whitelist or block dangerous links based on blacklist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Safeweb.app we use cloud technology. You just need to use your smart phone to automate the control of the computer to protect your children on the internet.

Premium but free child protection features:
- Uninstall Prevention
- Disable Prevention
- Private mode Prevention

With the above features, all children are safe while surfing the web. You just need to install the Windows app and the extension with the above features will be automatically installed into the system. Link to download the app https://safeweb.app/en/download/
